short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is developed to download all the changed files in a PR of a repository at github with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- What the item does ?
This extension when activated will add a button "Download all changed files" to the GitHub website specifically to the web page which comes after clicking on a particular pull request.

- Why users should install it ?
A user once need to provide a personal access token (PAT) first as mentioned in the readme file as well as in the graphical user interface of the dialog boxes and then by clicking on the above mentioned button all the changed files present in that pull request will be downloaded in that user's system as a zip file which when extracted will contain all the files in the same file system pattern or the folders pattern which are present in that pull request's repository. So this makes a user convenient to get all the files organised at one click rather than going one by one on each file to download it.
